title: safar1980
author: safar1980
content: "We are happy to announce an amazing update from WoolyPooly. We listened to your feedback, analyzed the data and made the impossible possible.Say goodbye to the old Nexa block maturation times (https://woolypooly.com/en/coin/nexa). No more marking 7 days on the calendar. No more looking at the clock. We've reduced the Nexa maturation time from a whole week to just ONE HOUR! ⏰"https://t.me/woolypoolyru/369966/438381Previously, a pud was seen stealing miners' coinshttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5441402.msg61826533#msg61826533

comments.author: FloppyPurpleGherkin
comments.body: Yeah fuck that stealing, scammy shit pool. It amazes me how many people actually still mine there

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: Quote from: FloppyPurpleGherkin on June 11, 2023, 10:30:12 PMYeah fuck that stealing, scammy shit pool. It amazes me how many people actually still mine there  I have seen many similar stories and any pool after the accusation speaks of software errors. The share of the pool is 30% now and 43,000 dollars worth of coins are mined per day. The pool has to freeze $90,000 worth of nex coins for a quick payout to the miners, and the pool won't cheat because it's afraid of more scandals.
